title: Sources: 49ers trade WR Samuel to Commanders
description: The San Francisco 49ers have agreed to send standout wide receiver Deebo Samuel to the Commanders in exchange for a fifth-round pick, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Saturday night, giving Washington another weapon for quarterback Jayden Daniels.

title: Sources: Manfred reviewing bid to reinstate Rose
description: Commissioner Rob Manfred is considering a petition filed by Pete Rose's family filed on Jan. 8 to have MLB's all-time hit leader posthumously removed from baseball's ineligible list, multiple sources with knowledge of the situation told ESPN Saturday.
author: Don Van Natta Jr.

title: 'He just lost it' - how costly will Cunha's red card prove?
description: The Brazil forward was sent off late in extra time as Wolves were knocked out of the FA Cup by Bournemouth on penalties. But how costly will his dismissal be for the club's Premier League survival?

title: 'Karachi a familiar low - England's rebuild starts here'
description: A familiar white-ball defeat for England in Karachi must mark the start of their rebuild, writes Matthew Henry.

title: NFL combine live updates: Bond isn't Worthy
description: Texas WR Isaiah Bond didn't break Xavier Worthy's 40-yard dash record on Saturday, but others came closer. Get the latest from Indianapolis.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Kansas guard Zeke Mayo shares abusive messages from social media users after Jayhawks' loss to Texas Tech
description: The Red Raiders beat Kansas 78-73 as KU lost its third home game of the season.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Wigan claim dominant win over Warrington in Las Vegas
description: Wigan Warriors scored eight tries in a 48-24 rout of Warrington Wolves in an historic Super League game at the Allegiant Stadium in Las Vegas.

title: FA Cup: Man Utd to face matured Fulham in FA Cup repeat
